short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT-powered AI to help you understand any code repositories on Github to boost your project

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeGenie for GitHub is a cutting-edge Chrome extension designed to be your ultimate coding companion. Seamlessly integrated with GitHub's interface, CodeGenie sits right beside your code, empowering you with a whole new level of comprehension and insight.

Features:

Enhanced Code Understanding: Gain invaluable contextual insights with CodeGenie's integration with OpenAI. CodeGenie efficiently accesses code files from repositories, empowering you to explore your projects like never before. Make informed decisions and optimize your development process effortlessly with a simple click.

Comprehensive Insights: CodeGenie's summarizers create accurate and insightful summaries of entire codebases. Armed with this comprehensive understanding, you can now ask detailed questions about single files or the entire codebase and receive answers that encompass the entire context of your code.

Build-in Prompt Library: Jumpstart meaningful conversations with CodeGenie's prompt library. Get the conversation going and receive relevant responses to drive your development journey forward.

--

Privacy and Security:
At CodeGenie, we take your privacy and data security seriously. The extension operates responsibly within GitHub's domain and the OpenAI API.

Experience the Future of GitHub Comprehension:
Step into the future of code comprehension with CodeGenie for GitHub. Empower yourself with unparalleled insights, enhance your coding expertise, and unleash the full potential of your repositories. Elevate your GitHub journey with CodeGenie today.


By downloading this extension you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
